scripts.hookIdea: POV: When you spend 6 hours mixing and your track still sounds like [show muffled, muddy audio]
beats: Hook: Frustrated producer throwing headphones (relatable moment)
Show multiple failed attempts at EQ/mixing (quick cuts)
Text overlay: 'If your mixes sound amateur no matter what you do...'
Pain point zoom: Compare muddy mix to pro release
Introduce RiffRight analyzing a track (UI showcase)
Reveal instant feedback and one-click fix

Don't claim it replaces professional engineers
